title: Understanding Your Audience
text: Consider who will be viewing your data. Are they familiar with data visualization techniques? Choose visuals that convey your message effectively to them.

title: Key Considerations for Visuals
text: Reflect on what you want your audience to take away from your presentation. The visual should highlight the most crucial data points.

title: Making Intentional Choices
text: Each visual element you include should serve a purpose. Does it clarify your data to your audience, or is it just decorative?

title: Avoiding Common Pitfalls
text: Relying too heavily on preset templates or software suggestions can lead to choosing less effective visuals. Customization may be key.
